Here's a one-star review based on your feedback:
Absolutely Awful - Avoid at All Costs
I've never experienced such terrible service in my life. I stood at the counter for over five minutes, completely ignored by the staff, even though the place was practically empty. The wait for food was even worse‚Äîit took a shocking 18 minutes to get a simple order ready, and then even longer for a single cappuccino.
The state of this place is disgusting. The tables were visibly dirty despite there being no other customers. And don't even get me started on the bathroom‚Äîit was full of roaches, and there was no paper towel or air dryer. The food was just "okay," but it's not worth the horrific experience.
This place is a complete disaster. Save yourself the trouble and money and go anywhere else. Yuck!

What a great spot! The staff at Bora Bora are fantastic-so welcoming, kind, and genuinely helpful. They made my visit a pleasure. Not only was the service incredibly quick, but the dessert and drink I had were fresh and absolutely delicious. This is my new favorite place for a sweet treat

I cane here with my two kids m, while we waited for our laundry to wash, the wait was a little long but it‚Äôs understandable since it‚Äôs brand new and a lot of people were dropping in to try. Two of the smoothies didn‚Äôt have the adjustments u made but they kindly remade it and were very kind and welcoming. This was a great quick smoothie place while we did our laundry. The seating was comfortable and the atmosphere were very relaxing and chill. I don‚Äôt ever rite reviews but they were very kind in correcting my order so I felt that the least I could do to appreciate was write a review of my experience, can‚Äôt wait to see this place flourish more as u see they have a another food area in the back that is a work in progress still, btw the smoothies were really good and refreshing thank you

I am so happy that there is a Bora Bora in Brighton Beach!!! The food was absolutely as amazing as I thought it would be. The cashier, the server, the batista, and the rest of the staff were so accommodating and respectful. I had the shaken oatmeal espresso for the first time here and I was not disappointed. Will definitely be going back.
Amazing place! The juices are super fresh and full of flavor. The staff is very friendly, and the service is fast. Highly recommend Bora Bora for anyone who loves delicious and refreshing drinks!

Every drink I‚Äôve tried has been so fresh, flavorful, and made with high-quality ingredients. They also have amazing desserts like a√ßa√≠ bowls and crepes that are just as good as their smoothies. The staff is always friendly and welcoming, and the vibe of the place just makes you feel good. It‚Äôs become my go-to spot whenever I want something refreshing and healthy. Highly recommend!

had the best experience at Bora Bora! The place is spotless and super welcoming it‚Äôs clear they take cleanliness seriously. I ordered an a√ßa√≠ bowl and WOW‚Ä¶ it was absolutely amazing. Fresh, perfectly balanced, and honestly the best I‚Äôve ever had. And the price Just right. Quality and value in one bowl! Definitely a five star spot I‚Äôll be coming back again and again.

I‚Äôve been at the Bora Bora in Bay Ridge many times and have been eagerly awaiting the opening of the one in Brighton for a while. The three of us came in on a Saturday night, ordered on the kiosk, and had the crepes in hand in under 15. My sister ordered the Nutella and strawberry crepes and I got the Bora Bora crepes, which is a sampler of all the flavors they sell. Everything tasted great and i will be back!

Absolutely love Bora Bora Smoothie Cafe! From the moment you walk in, the tropical vibes and friendly atmosphere make you feel like you‚Äôre on a mini island getaway. The smoothies are always fresh, flavorful, and made with quality ingredients ‚Äî you can really taste the difference.

My personal favorite is the Boraklyn. Every drink I‚Äôve tried has been delicious. They also offer great add-ons like protein, chia seeds, and immunity boosters.

The staff is super friendly and knowledgeable ‚Äî they‚Äôre happy to help you choose the perfect combo based on your taste or dietary needs. Clean space, quick service, and reasonable prices. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for a healthy treat or a refreshing pick-me-up!

It‚Äôs a great place whether ur with ur kids or by yourself or with a partner. All their drinks are delicious, I‚Äôve tried the red rocket, unicorn, toro. Great mix of drinks and desserts. My favorite dessert is probably the mini pancakes. I like everything about this place.

Customer service was amazing, helped us pick what we wanted to eat. We ordered an A√ßa√≠ bowl, Crepe, and dubai chocolate covered strawberries. The a√ßa√≠ bowl came with nutella and peanut butter and when finished, we asked for more and without a doubt they generously gave us more. Great place! Will definitely be coming back!

The dessert was amazing! Very very good creeps. I tried the Bora-Bora and the Dubai, and both of them were an explosion of incredible flavors like pistachio, kinder and fruits. Everyone should come!!!
I went yesterday to give it a try and it was absolutely worth it. This is my favourite place to go from now on. Absolutely loved it.
The food is very tasty and the chocolate is. High-quality. The place is very clean and beautiful

First time there and I abalone love this place! The ingredients are always fresh, the menu has a great variety of juices, smoothies, and wellness shots, and everything tastes amazing. You can really tell they care about quality. The staff is super friendly and welcoming, and the space has a clean, relaxed vibe that makes you want to hang out a little longer. Whether you‚Äôre grabbing a quick drink or looking for something healthy and energizing, this place never disappoints. Highly recommend!

The aesthetic of the place is fun and vibrant, making it a great location to spend time chilling with friends. As for the dining, there is a diverse set of drinks ranging from chocolate/candy to more fruity options. There is also a sandwich bar that provides very valuable options, ranging from 6-7 dollars. It also helps that the building is nicely air conditioned, making it a nice spot during the summer. I would definitely recommend!
Got really nice refreshments from Brighton Beach Bora Bora! Great atmosphere and quick service. Staff was friendly and they'll have food soon too! All halal ‚ú®
If you‚Äôre a big fan of coffee, you gotta try this place asap. One of the best ice latte! Customer service 10/10 overall ambience 10/10 ‚ù§Ô∏è

The desserts here are really good. The flavors are fresh and the place is nice and clean. I would definitely come back again. The staff is friendly and helpful. It‚Äôs a great spot to relax and enjoy something sweet.

Such a great place, tasty coconut bowls. A great idea to have it in Brighton street. A nice gateway from the heat too!
The owner Saad is a very hospitable and nice guy too. He personally checked with us if everything is tasty! Thank you!

I have been waiting for them to open for the last 3 months and they did not disappoint. Everything was perfect. The ambiance and vibes are amazing and the food was even better. Good size portions and the prices are very reasonable for the quality. The staff is very welcoming and I got my order in under 7 minutes. I will be a regular here.

The a√ßa√≠ bowl was super fresh and delicious‚Äîexactly what I was craving. The staff was friendly and welcoming, which made the experience even better. There‚Äôs plenty of space to sit and chill, and the vibe is really relaxed and cozy. Definitely a spot I‚Äôll be coming back to!

Absolutely wonderful service best in Brighton Beach!
Saad is the man! He served me amazing drinks and made sure everything was perfect the entire time. Super friendly, attentive, and professional. Definitely coming back 10/10 experience!

SO GOOD I ATE HERE TWICE IN ONE DAY!
The quality and quantity is perfect. Delicious and fresh and filling. Every thing I want in a a√ßa√≠ bowl. Beautiful presentation and excellent taste. They are very generous with the serving size. Totally worth it. I will be buying here allllll the time!!! Keep up the great work thank you for your service. Also the mango oat refresher is DELISH!!! Yum
I loved everything  the atmosphere, the food, and the employees were all great! üòç The cashier girl was really sweet too. Thank God she spoke Uzbek when we came that made everything even better!
They have delicious crepes you should try.

I ate there during initial opening day, it was pretty good. But I came in today to order a Waffle Maple Syrup and a Lemon Mint.....and boy was i dissapointed. The wait time was OVER 30 minutes..., the waffle was the size of my palm and was really cold and I spent $22.. I would not recommend. The enviroment is great but besides that, i am very dissapointed in the quality of food and portion of food i received. BE WARY AND STAY CLEAR OF THE PRICES TO PORTION RATIO.

couldn‚Äôt be happier with the quality and service I received. Everything was top-notch ‚Äî from the attention to detail to the fast, friendly service. It‚Äôs clear they care about their customers and go the extra mile. Highly recommended and will definitely return!
Sooo so so good!! The place is very clean and comfy! Definitely coming back!

food was good and tasty but took awhile to make. the milkshake was very liquidy and not thick like a regular milkshake. the chairs and tables move but the tables aren‚Äôt big enough and it‚Äôs very cold here. so make sure you have a sweater if you want to eat in here.
The smoothies, the atmosphere, the service, and the interior are all fantastic ‚Äî I highly recommend to all customers!! Saad is also really kind, my family and I really enjoyed our cafe outing here!

Okay wait‚Ä¶ this place is actually so cute. I came in just wanting something light but ended up obsessed. The smoothie bowls are mad pretty AND filling (like, Instagram-worthy but they also actually taste good). I got the acai bowl with peanut butter and I swear it gave me life.
